name: Face the Dicequences
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Face the Dicequences is a simple roguelike game where you must pay off your debt by rolling the dice.

Dice Types:
  • 1-6 Die: This is the standard die. Roll from 1 to 6.
  • Even Die: Roll a 2, 4, or 6.
  • Odd Die: Roll a 1, 3, or 5.
  • High Die: Roll a 4, 5, or 6.
  • Low Die: Roll a 1, 2, or 3.
  • Lucky 7 Die: Roll a +7, 0, or -7
    • If +7, gain 7 .
    • If -7, gain 7 .
  • Crazy 8 Die: Roll a +8 or -8.
    • If +8, gain 8 .
    • If -8, gain 8 .
  • Lucky Clover Die: Roll a 3 or 4.
    • If 4, gain 2 for every 
  • All For One Die: Roll a 1 or +1.
    • If +1, gain 2 Coins for every 
  • Slow Die: Slowly roll from 1 to 6.

Will you be lucky enough to pay off your debt in time? I can't answer that. Anyways, enjoy the game!

Credit(s):
  • Mixkit - Sound Effects
  • Kenney - Casino Audio
  • "Jazz Brunch " Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
